text: فَذَرْهُمْ يَخُوضُوا۟ وَيَلْعَبُوا۟ حَتَّىٰ يُلَـٰقُوا۟ يَوْمَهُمُ ٱلَّذِى يُوعَدُونَ

translation.en.sahih: So leave them to converse vainly and amuse themselves until they meet their Day which they are promised.
translation.id.indonesian: Maka biarlah mereka tenggelam (dalam kesesatan) dan bermain-main sampai mereka menemui hari yang dijanjikan kepada mereka.
